name: 789 POKER
description:
Welcome to 789 Poker!

789 Poker is an online social poker room with the global standard poker rules.
Our website aims to please various users of differing level and knowledge, from amateur players who have newly started playing poker, to skilled, pro poker players with an active role in On/Offline competitions, with our effort to place each and every user in the right poker table matching their levels.
Are you a seasoned poker player? Show off your competence at 789 Poker!


※ Game Features ※

※ DO NOT BE LIMITED BY TIME & PLACE ANY MORE!
- You can enjoy 789 Poker readily on your mobile anytime, anywhere.

※ AVAILABLE TO PLAY UP TO 5 POKER TABLES AT A TIME!
- Still staring into the screen waiting for your turn?
789 Poker allows you to play up to 5 matches simultaneously.

※ BREAKAWAY FROM HEAVY ATMOSPHERE!
- Buddy up with poker buffs all over the world through various social functions of 789 Poker.

※ ASSORTED POKER GAMES IN YOUR HAND
- Poker app full of ‘HOTTEST’ games offered to you only at 789 Poker.

※ TAKE PART IN THE TOURNAMENT AND WIN AN AMAZING PRIZE!
- Daily tournaments in various levels available all the time.

Contact us at Help@789poker.com for any queries! We are happy to help!
